Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This report describes unique contrast enhancement of the white matter on T1 - weighted magnetic resonance images of two patients with disseminated necrotizing leukoencephalopathy , which developed from acute lymphoblastic leukemia treated with high - dose methotrexate .

| disseminated necrotizing leukoencephalopathy |
| acute lymphoblastic leukemia |

The two disease entities found in the paragraph are "disseminated necrotizing leukoencephalopathy" and "acute lymphoblastic leukemia".
